name: David Ramirez
text: The stunts were definitely on another level for the new one. Also, Immorten (?) is surely the most visually impressive of the bad guys that have appeared in Mad Max movies (well... Tina Turner in chainmail was impressive too, but not quite with the same effect...).    There were a lot of interesting background details that nobody made a big deal of, which worked well.
